generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, which is the primary surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: The curb and paved area alongside the road where cars are parked indicate a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with windows and commercial signage are visible in the background and on the right side.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green and yellow leaves are present along the road and sidewalks.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible between the sidewalk and the road, as well as along the edges of the road.
- person: A few individuals can be seen walking on the sidewalk in the background.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road, and one car is visible driving ahead in the lane.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the left side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign (P) is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and street lights.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, mounted on a pole.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the left side of the road, near the sidewalk.
